thread.title: Beyonce's pregnancy snap is now most liked Instagram image ever – it's easy to see why
thread.title_full: Beyonce's pregnancy snap is now most liked Instagram image ever – it's easy to see why

author: Joshua Barrie
title: Beyonce's pregnancy snap is now most liked Instagram image ever – it's easy to see why
text:
Beyonce's pregnancy snap is now most liked Instagram image ever – it's easy to see why The number of likes is astounding Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Beyonce reveals she is pregnant with twins Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Beyonce is pregnant. She's having twins. The pop princess announced it last night, and the crowd went wild. 
She confirmed the news that she and husband Jay Z are adding to their family on on Wednesday. 
The 35-year-old Halo singer - who already has daughter Blue Ivy with the rapper - shocked fans with an intimate photo on Instagram . 
"We would like to share our love and happiness," she wrote in a statement. 
"We have been blessed two times over." Bey https://www.instagram.com/p/BP-rXUGBPJa/embed 
When we say people were excited, we mean it. Beyonce's picture is now the most liked photo ever on the photo sharing site. There's also a concern as to whether Beyonce will still perform at Coachella . 
At the time of writing, it's been liked more than 7,500,000 times. Truly epic. My sorrowful record is 74 (for a bowl of pasta). Upsetting. 
Youngster Blue Ivy is also said to be looking forward to having some siblings. Read More
